wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Charles Douglas Packard   (1903 – 2000) was a British Army General who achieved high office in the 1950s.

response: * Lieutenant-General Charles Douglas Packard, CB, CBE, DSO (26992). Colonel Commandant, Royal Regiment of Artillery.
*Major-General Charles Douglas Packard, C.B.E., D.S.O., late Royal Regiment of Artillery.
